data.lyric:
[ti:Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snow (Capitol Version|Remastered 1998)]
[ar:Dean Martin]
[al:Christmas Sing-Along Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow! (下雪吧) (Remaster) - Dean Martin (迪安·马丁)
[00:02.62]Lyrics by：Jule Styne/Sammy Cahn
[00:05.24]Composed by：Jule Styne/Sammy Cahn
[00:07.87]Oh the weather outside is frightful
[00:11.19]But the fire is so delightful
[00:14.71]And since we've no place to go
[00:18.33]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
[00:21.82]Man it doesn't show signs of stopping
[00:25.29]And I've brought me some corn for popping
[00:29.21]The lights are turned way down low
[00:32.44]Let it snow let it snow
[00:36.36]When we finally kiss goodnight
[00:39.73]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[00:43.13]But if you really hold me tight
[00:47.13]All the way home I'll be warm
[00:50.35]And the fire is slowly dying
[00:53.77]And my dear we're still goodbye-ing
[00:57.38]But as long as you love me so
[01:00.82]Let it snow let it snow and snow
[01:18.91]When we finally kiss goodnight
[01:22.30]How I'll hate going out in the storm
[01:25.81]But if you really grab me tight
[01:29.77]All the way home I'll be warm
[01:32.99]Oh the fire is slowly dying
[01:36.40]And my dear we're still goodbye-ing
[01:40.05]But as long as you love me so
[01:43.41]Let it snow let it snow let it snow
data.trans:
[ti:let it snow]
[ar:不认识。]
[al:116505]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:05.73]哦，外面的天气好可怕
[00:09.26]但是这火让我感到高兴
[00:12.89]既然我们无处可去
[00:15.96]就让雪下吧，让雪下吧，让雪下吧！
[00:20.00]雪似乎没有任何要停的迹象
[00:23.12]我买了一些玉米，我们可以爆爆米花
[00:27.01]灯光变得越来越暗
[00:30.13]就让雪下吧，让雪下吧，让雪下吧！
[00:33.62]当我们最后亲吻道晚安时
[00:37.14]我真是烦死了在暴风雨的时候外出！
[00:40.67]但是如果你紧紧地抱着我
[00:44.20]回家的一路上我都会觉得很温暖
[00:47.78]火渐渐地灭了
[00:51.21]而我亲爱的，我们仍在告别
[00:54.83]但是只要你爱我
[00:58.31]就让雪下吧，让雪下吧，让雪下吧！
[01:01.99]当我们最后亲吻道晚安时
[01:19.54]我真是烦死了在暴风雨的时候外出！
[01:23.02]但是如果你紧紧地抱着我
[01:26.50]回家的一路上我都会觉得很温暖
[01:30.59]火渐渐地灭了
[01:33.62]而我亲爱的，我们仍在告别
[01:37.15]但是只要你爱我
[01:40.62]就让雪下吧，让雪下吧，让雪下吧！
[01:52.69]//
[01:54.00]
